snippet: A new strategy for protecting access to the ballot box is coming into focus.
abstract: Editorial reports that a growing circle of legal scholars is focusing on a lower-profile Supreme Court ruling written by Justice Antonin Scalia that may point the way to a new approach to protecting voting rights; notes that the ruling hinged upon the power of Congress under the so-called 'elections clause' in the Constitution; urges Congress to use this authority to protect the right to vote.
lead_paragraph: A new strategy for protecting access to the ballot box is coming into focus.
